thread.title: Great hotel nestled in quiet residential neighbourhood
thread.title_full: Great hotel nestled in quiet residential neighbourhood - Review of The Nadler Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LeanneinVan
title: Great hotel nestled in quiet residential neighbourhood
text: I had one night in London on my own, and this simple and charming hotel was just perfect. Clean, modern, simple and very reasonably priced. Close to the tube and the lovely curving streets of South Kensington. Nespresso machine one the room was most appreciated in the morning!
